name: db-explorer
description: Connect to any SQL database (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite) and explore schemas, run queries, and visualize results with interactive charts.

connection_string.title: Database Connection String
connection_string.description: Connection string for your database (e.g. postgres://user:pass@host/db, mysql://user:pass@host/db, sqlite:///path/to/file.db). You can also connect at runtime using the connect tool.

tools.name: connect
tools.description: Connect to a database via connection string

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all tables with estimated row counts

tools.name: describe_table
tools.description: Describe columns, types, constraints, and foreign keys for a table

tools.name: get_schema
tools.description: Get the full database schema with relationships

tools.name: explain_query
tools.description: Show execution plan and index usage for a query

tools.name: chart
tools.description: Render an interactive chart from query results
